snippet.title: Project Madras | Open world Indie game announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Project Madras - An open world Indie game setup in Chennai aka Madras.

Explore and experience the vibe of namma Chennai through "PROJECT MADRAS". The game which lets you roam around the shores of Marina ,streets of mount road , monuments of Chennai covering all the highlights of this city, with a mission to accomplish!. The flavour of this open world game is rich in content and language, as it takes place in the capital city of the state, where the world's oldest language "TAMIL" is still surviving and embraced over centuries. Get involved with the natives of the city, where a rooted love and affection is served  with some spicy madras delicacy.

Project Madras is an ambitious project that we've been working on for the past few months. We hope you'll join us on this journey and support us as we work to create the best Indian indie game possible!

Wishlist on steam now and receive updates on playtesting
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2864600/Project_Madras/
Follow us on insta : https://www.instagram.com/projectmadras
Follow us on twitter : https://mobile.twitter.com/ProjectMadras
Join the discord server : https://discord.gg/6qBNwDrnj5
www.projectmadras.com
